description: Differences between partial products of Gray code (A048642) and factorials (A000142).
formula: a(0) = 0, a(n) = product(XORnos(j, floor(j/2)), j=1..n) - n!.a(n) = A048642(n) - A000142(n).
prog: (PARI) a(n) = prod(i=1, n, bitxor(i, i>>1)) - n!; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 02 2015
author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 14 1999
